description: Flexibly set up when an appointment should be bookable in our appointment scheduler. Click the {icon}icon to remove an appointment slot and the {icon}icon to add it.

event.title: What is the maximum number of participants that can attend the appointment?

max.info: For example, if you set "5", 5 customers can book an appointment in the specified period. Only after the 5th (verified) booking, the appointment slot will no longer be displayed as available.
max.title: What is the maximum number of customer appointments that can take place at the same time?

title: Appointment planner
